name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Python Backend Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in building high-performance, cloud-native applications using **Python**, **FastAPI**, and a robust tech stack that includes **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Proficient in implementing CI/CD pipelines, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, and optimizing data workflows with **Airflow** and **PySpark**. Experienced in backend database management with **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, ensuring data integrity and performance.

Demonstrated expertise in Agile methodologies, emphasizing collaboration and continuous improvement in software development. Exceptionally skilled in designing and building microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and integrating security and compliance standards. Strong background in version control using **GitLab** and deploying effective solutions that lead to intelligent decision-making and automation. Passionate about leveraging technology to deliver impactful results while adhering to best practices in software engineering.

experience.responsibilities:

•	Developed CI/CD pipelines with **GitLab** and integrated **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, achieving a 50% faster deployment time across diverse projects.
•	Built cloud-based solutions using **GCP** and **Azure**, employing **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, which improved environment provisioning speed by **30%**.
•	Designed and optimized robust data architectures with **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, enhancing data retrieval times and enabling seamless scaling for large datasets.
•	Implemented workflows using **Apache Airflow** for scheduling and managing data pipeline tasks, resulting in a 40% decrease in processing delays.
•	Incorporated **Elasticsearch** for advanced search functionalities across various applications, significantly improving query response times to under **100 milliseconds**.
•	Led application development following Agile methodologies, fostering cross-functional team collaboration to enhance project outcomes and client satisfaction.
•	Enhanced backend operations with automation tools, focusing on improving overall system reliability and reducing manual interventions. 
•	Worked collaboratively with frontend teams to ensure seamless integration of APIs while maintaining high standards of code quality and efficiency.

• Developed and maintained scalable backend solutions using **Python** and **FastAPI**, ensuring high performance for high-volume transaction systems.
• Utilized **Azure** and **GCP** to deploy applications, enhancing reliability and availability in a cloud environment.
• Implemented containerization with **Docker** and orchestration using **Kubernetes** to streamline CI/CD processes, achieving deployment efficiency improvements of up to **50%**.
• Designed and optimized data models in **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB** to support robust data storage and retrieval mechanisms, increasing query performance by **30%**.
• Integrated **Airflow** for automated ETL processes, allowing seamless data ingestion from multiple sources, resulting in a **40%** reduction in data processing time.
• Developed and maintained data pipelines using **PySpark**, ensuring timely and efficient data analytics for decision-making.
• Leveraged **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, facilitating consistent deployment environments and reducing setup time by **60%**.
• Collaborated in an **Agile** environment to define project requirements and adapt to changing priorities, improving team throughput by **20%**.

Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability for over **9 million** users across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines and deployed applications on **GCP** and **Azure**, leveraging **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, to facilitate seamless delivery and manage infrastructure as code using **Terraform**.
Developed data storage solutions using **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, ensuring distributed data access for high-traffic workflows and achieving a **30%** increase in read performance through optimized caching strategies.
Engineered data processing workflows with **Airflow** and **PySpark**, improving data ingestion times by **50%** and enabling timely analytics for real-time decision-making.
Applied Agile methodologies to enhance project delivery timelines, ensuring project milestones were met with a reduction in deployment issues by **20%**.
Implemented monitoring and alerting using **Elasticsearch**, providing real-time insights and maintaining system reliability, improving uptime by **99.9%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate application logging and debugging capabilities using **GitLab**, facilitating improved code reviews and repository management.
Leveraged secure coding practices to ensure compliance with security standards, applying role-based access control (RBAC) and OAuth 2.0 for user authentication and data protection across the platform.
